# INShortcut.intent(_:)

**Case**

The intent that performs the action when invoking the shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
case intent(INIntent)
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **INShortcut.userActivity(_:)**: The user activity that defines the action to perform when invoking the shortcut.

items.description: The user activity that defines the action to perform when invoking the shortcut.
items.name: INShortcut.userActivity(_:)
